alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 9:55AM PST until March 10 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING ABOVE 3000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches with over two feet possible above 4500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will start out around 3000 feet on Thursday and slowly rise to 4500 feet late Thursday night or Friday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
